intro: I am a chatbot, how can i have a gender
I am an AI chatbot. I am made to help you
greeting: Wassup! good to hear from you. How can i help you?
Heya! happy to help you. Any queries?
Hi! I'm ready to answer all your questions.
query: Our service is safe and reliable.
Our product price are in budget.
We offer 15% discount on orders more than Rs. 5000.
payment: We provide UPI and COD service.
product: We offer variety of products ranging from books, clothing, shoes, kitchenware, groceries, electronics.
delivery: Orders will be delivered within 2-4 working days.
Our delivery is free of charge.
ending: Bye! hope you had a good experience.
Do you have any other questions?
thanks: it makes me happy to help.
